[event]
# Treasure Chest
type=event
location=16,10,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=loot/il_chest_common.txt

mapmod=object,16,10,266
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Treasure Chest

[event]
# Crate

[enemy]
